snippet.title: SILVER CHAINS | Gameplay Trailer | Survival Horror | Indie
snippet.description:
We still frantically developing our first survival horror game in first person perspective.
Our team wants to please you with a new teaser for our first game Silver Chains!
______________________________________________________________________
Silver Chains - is a psychological horror game from the first person perspective.The plot reveals the history of the main character’s past (a boy of 17) and the history of the mansion in which the boy was born. The gameplay is focused on exploring the environment, finding hints and mini-games. Our team tried to give the game an eerie atmosphere, and the plot is mystic and terrifying. During the game, the player learns the terrible secrets of the past of the main character, his family and the details of the bloody events, which took place in this mansion. 
___________________________________________________________________________
Website: http://crackedheadsgames.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/cracked_heads
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/crackedheadsgames/
